column5: Spent a few hours out and about on my home lake. Got some fish, and some time with jack and the dog before bed.
great video!  When does the ice go out up there?  Looks like you still a ways to go.  Cheers!
Thanks, we still have 3 feet of ice, finally warming up this week with daytime highs in double digits, but nite time still below zero, might be a few icebergs by walleye opener on 19th May.
I was going to say there may still be ice for opener up there.  Cheers!
Living the dream Simon. All we have down here is slush and mud.
